channel.title: I need a good client any ideas
channel.description: the sever i use is figmentscape when i used silabscape i loged in and it worked but when i tryed to put my sever on the sever list it didnt work thats why i want a client.

item.title: I need a good client any ideas
item.dc:creator: @BoneArmyProductions BoneArmyProductions
item.description:
@BoneArmyProductions wrote:

bigcasey123:

the sever i use is figmentscape when i used silabscape i loged in and it worked but when i tryed to put my sever on the sever list it didnt work thats why i want a client.

If your using a server like figment it wont work on those good clients u see with new god sword emotes. so i dont think you will be able to use it.
and btw figment was made for silab, i dont see why you want to get a new client. it will mean you have to add all the models, ints.

Read full topic
